General.Name: Carlin Gold Corporation
General.Description: Carlin Gold Corporation, an exploration stage company, engages in the identification, evaluation, acquisition, and exploration of gold properties in the United States and Canada. Its flagship property is the Cortez Summit property that includes 142 unpatented claims located in Eureka County, Nevada. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
